    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE sensor_data SET temperature = temperature + 2, humidity = humidity - 5 WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE sensor_data SET temperature = CASE WHEN temperature < 20 THEN 20 WHEN temperature > 30 THEN 30 ELSE temperature END, humidity = CASE WHEN humidity < 40 THEN humidity + 10 ELSE humidity END;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                    location VARCHAR(255),
                    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
                    reading_value FLOAT,
                    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE temperature_readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                             sensor_id INT,
                             temperature FLOAT,
                             reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                             FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id))

CREATE TABLE humidity_readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                          sensor_id INT,
                          humidity FLOAT,
                          reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                          FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id))

### STATEMENT

UPDATE sensors SET location='Room A' WHERE sensor_id=1

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                    location VARCHAR(255),
                    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
                    reading_value FLOAT,
                    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE temperature_readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                             sensor_id INT,
                             temperature FLOAT,

                          humidity FLOAT,
                          reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                          FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id))

### STATEMENT

UPDATE humidity_readings SET humidity = 62.3 WHERE sensor_id = (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room B')
